first.title:
Thank you for joining us in the fight against COVID-19!

With your help we grow stronger.

second.title: Protect yourself
second.description:
The STAYAWAY COVID app works as a radar by sharing randomly generated depersonalised identifiers with nearby mobile phones. These identifiers are stored for 14 days on your mobile phone only.

The app does not require access to an individual's location nor to personal data.

third.title: Timely Alert Notifications
third.description:
If someone you have been in close contact with very recently later tests positive for COVID-19, STAYAWAY COVID will alert you.

With this information on your side, you can self-assess your infection risk and make decisions that will affect your health and the health of those you live and interact with.

fourth.title: Protect others around you
fourth.description:
If you have been diagnosed with COVID-19, with the result of your test you will be given a code that will allow STAYAWAY COVID to alert all of those you have come in close contact with in the past 14 days but preserving your anonimity.

This a fundamental step to break chains of infection and protect your and others’ health.

description.first: For more information, you can read our privacy policy and terms of use at any time.

read_and_understood.first:
I read and understood the information about the STAYAWAY application, namely:
• Identity of the Controller -
read_and_understood.third:
• The types of data collected and voluntarily shared after any diagnosis confirming infection, through random identifier keys.
• The purpose of data collection and processing, namely concerning the notifications sent.
• How data will be stored and for how long.
• That I can freely revoke my consent at any time, by uninstalling the application, without affecting the legality of the previous processing actions.
• That in the cases of children under 13, consent can only be given or authorised by the holders of parental responsibilities.
• Contact of Data Protection Officer:

consents.data_treatment: I agree with the processing of my personal data, in compliance with the privacy policy, including data related to my health condition, required to send notifications on the exposure to potential risks of contagion, in order to help interrupting the chains of COVID-19 infection.

accessibility.label: Accept and Start
accessibility.hint: Accept terms and conditions and start using the app

accessibility.label: Settings
accessibility.hint: Navigates to the settings screen

healthy.title: No high-risk contacts have been established.

description.first: STAYAWAY COVID will be constantly monitoring your risk level
description.second: and will alert you if you have been exposed to risk. Avoid contacts closer than 2 metres from you.

exposed.title: You have been close to someone with COVID-19.

description.first: It doesn’t mean you are infected,
description.second: but you should self-isolate and contact health services.
description.third: Even if you show no symptoms, you should call

infected.title: Thank you for playing your part protecting others’ lives.

description.first: We wish you a quick recovery.
description.second:
Since you have tested positive for COVID-19, STAYAWAY COVID will be disabled and stop tracing your contacts.

Once recovered, make sure you reinstall the app in order to restart contact tracing.

bluetooth.title: Bluetooth disabled
bluetooth.message: Turn on Bluetooth to allow STAYAWAY COVID to work properly

battery.title: Battery optimization enabled

gaen.title: Monitoring disabled
gaen.message: Please enable Exposure Notifications logging to allow STAYAWAY COVID to work properly

healthy.distance: Keep at least 2 metres away from others
healthy.wash_hands: Wash or sanitise your hands as frequently as possible
healthy.feeling_sick: If you feel unwell, stay at home

exposed.encloused_spaces: Avoid socialising in enclosed spaces with people outside of your household
exposed.increase_hygiene: Reinforce hand hygiene and cleaning of surfaces
exposed.wear_mask: Wear a cloth face mask to protect others and yourself

code_input.title: Have you tested positive for COVID-19?

description.first: Along with your diagnosis, you were given a code by your doctor.
description.second: Enter the code to give the app permission to anonymously share your random identifiers. This code is valid for 24 hours only.

accessibility.label: Submit
accessibility.hint: Press to submit diagnosis code

completed.title: Thank you!
completed.description: The anonymous sharing of this information is extremely important to help contain the spread of COVID-19.

accessibility.hint: Press to navigate to home screen

network.title: No Internet connection
network.description: Please verify your Internet connection and try again.

server_error.title: No connection with the server
server_error.description: Please, wait a moment and try again.

too_much_requests.title: Too many requests
too_much_requests.description: You made too many requests in a row to the server. Please, try again later.

invalid_code.title: Invalid Code
invalid_code.description: Please, enter a valid code to proceed.

expired_code.title: Expired Code
expired_code.description: The code that you entered has expired. Please, enter a valid code to proceed.

playstore.title: Google Play Services
playstore.description: To enable the use of the Exposure Notification API an update to Google Play Services is required. If an update is not yet available on your device, try again later.

permissions.title: Permission denied
permissions.description: In order to use STAYAWAY COVID these permissions are required.

enable.title: Exposure Notification Logging
enable.description: Exposure Notification Logging needs to be active in order for STAYAWAY COVID to work properly

export.title: Sharing your random IDs
export.description: In order to submit your positive diagnosis you need to share your random IDs

submit.code: The entered code is invalid, please try again
